price: Kandi ntibazagira abavugizi mu bigirwamana byabo, ndetse bazabyihakana.
arabic: وَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُم مِّن شُرَكَآئِهِمۡ شُفَعَٰٓؤُاْ وَكَانُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ كَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: walam yakun lahum min shurakāihim shufaʿāu wakānū bishurakāihim kāfirīna
